### W3555-238750: Horizontal Test Bench

#### Government of Canada Tender Announcement

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RP)

**Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)

**Notice Reference Number**: W3555-238750

**Tender Closing Date**: [Friday, September 21, 2023, at 2:00 PM local time (EST)](https://www.datetimefromtimezone.com)

**Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding

**Description**

The Department of National Defence, Fleet Maintenance Facility Cape Breton is looking for a horizontal test bench for the testing and certification of various rigging equipment, including wire rope, chains, bridles, straps, slings, and other relevant appliances.

[Learn more about the tender and its requirements.](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17322738?extsite=MTczMjI3MzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Key Information**

* **Goods and Services Category**: Measuring and observing and testing instruments (UNSPSC Code: 41110000)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* **Regions of Delivery**: British Columbia
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), represented by the Fleet Maintenance Facility Cape Breton
* **End-User Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)

**Contact Information**

For further information regarding this tender announcement, please contact:

Anthony Mitch / TPSGC / PSPC
[Email contactInfoEmail: mitch.anthony@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:mitch.anthony@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) or (no phone number available)
